language.name: 简体中文
tutorial_0: 你的护盾条是蓝色条，还有数字。你的能量条是左边的条,上面有电池图标。能量可以被冲刺和重装主武器消耗。当能量低于一半时,如果你短时间内没有冲刺,它会自动充满到一半。要进一步补充能量,你可以使用一些职业技能,以及满血的医疗包。小医疗包可以补充50点护盾和少量能量,大医疗包可以补充100点护盾和大量能量。医疗包会随时间慢慢充满,但你可以在它们未满时就使用。
tutorial_1: 你的主武器是你职业装备中最宝贵的部分。使用右键开火。你也可以通过丢弃主武器或技能来重装。摧毁这个机器人以继续。
tutorial_2: 你的技能平衡了你的职业。你的前两个技能是主动技能,必须使用(右键)来激活。你的第三个物品是被动技能,会自动激活。尝试使用你的手雷和急救技能。
tutorial_3: 你可能想练习使用每个职业以更好地理解它们。你可以在训练场进行练习,在那里你将结束教程。当你准备好去了,请在职业选择区使用返回母舰标志。
unlock_entry: §f<§9训练监督员§f>你的训练从这里的入口开始。每波结束后,你将获得能量来打开门或解锁技能。如果你和朋友在一起,蹲在他们附近可以救活他们。你的目标是逃离设施。祝你好运。
unlock_hangar: §f<§9训练监督员§f>逃生飞船位于机库(寻找绿点)。你需要5个终端,或等待到50波后让逃生船有足够的能量离开。
unlock_hall: §f<§9训练监督员§f>你可以解锁你的次要和第三技能。这需要消耗能量,但可能会非常有用。
bot:
§4机器人
§c一个简单的中等生命值机器人
armored_bot:
§4装甲机器人
§c一个简单的高生命值机器人
mine_runner:
§4地雷机器人
§c一个速度很快、生命值低且接近时会爆炸的机器人
poison_bot:
§4毒气机器人
§c一个会发射毒气弹的中等生命值机器人
ranged_bot:
§4远程机器人
§c一个远程攻击的中等生命值机器人
ranged_explosive_bot:
§4远程爆炸机器人
§c一个射击炸弹的高生命值远程机器人
slow_bot:
§4缓慢机器人
§c一个高生命值会减慢附近敌人的机器人
zap_bot:
§4电击机器人
§c一个会缓慢治疗其他机器人的机器人
bonus_bot:
§4装甲机器人
§c一个简单的高生命值机器人
fire_bot:
§4火焰机器人
§c一个速度很快会喷出火焰的机器人
armored_boss:
§4装甲boss
§c一个生命值极高的机器人
mechanic_boss:
§4维修boss
§c一个生命值极高会建造炮塔的机器人
ranged_boss:
§4远程boss
§c一个生命值极高且射击频率增加的远程机器人
final_boss:
§4最终boss
§c一个拥有所有其他机器人技能的机器人
launch_lore1: 向上发射到更高的地方
adrenaline_lore1: 生命值低时获得速度提升
burst_heal_lore1: 一种影响所有队友的治疗道具
prepared_lore1: 做好准备的士兵有优势
vis_mine_lore1: 一种可以帮助你发现敌人的地雷
distance_lore1: 投射物加速会增加伤害
plasma_grenade_launcher_lore: 一种高容量的等离子手雷发射器
sticky_bomb_lore1: 发射一枚非常黏性的炸弹
plasma_cannon_lore: 一种容量大但伤害低的爆能枪
top_lore1: 减少护盾能量意味着更多能量用于武器
heal_pistol_lore: 可以治疗队友或伤害敌人
over_heal_machine_lore1: 一种高能量护盾增强器
over_heal_machine_lore2: §r - 允许治疗超过正常生命值
over_heal_machine_lore3: §r - 一次只能对一个玩家生效
days_work_lore1: 证明你的战斗技能的机会
days_work_lore2: §r - 每次远程命中恢复2点生命值
spin_slash_lore1: 得益于强大的外骨骼伺服系统
final_stance_lore2: §r - 远离敌人时移动速度增加
unstable_surge_rifle_lore: 一种改装过的脉冲步枪
warp_lore2: §r - 传送到你正在看的方向
flash_grenade_lore1: 一种高能量的闪光手雷
power_pants_lore2: §r - 跳跃高度是正常的两倍
double_chambered_scattergun_lore: 一种容量低但伤害高的散弹枪
turret_lore2: §r - 建造一个可配置的炮塔
wrench_lore1: 用于维修炮塔的必需工具
wrench_lore3: §r - 如果炮塔生命值满则改变它的模式
last_resort_lore2: §r - 没有部署炮塔时装填速度提高50%
chemsprayer_lore: 射出会持续伤害的毒素弹丸
medicine_lore2: §r - 5秒内给附近所有队友能量提升
medicine_lore3: §r - 5秒内给附近所有队友速度提升
biohazard_lore1: 谁把这个乱象留在这里的?
biohazard_lore2: §r - 在完成装填后留下一个毒素球
plasma_pistol_lore: 一种隐秘的高伤害手枪
recloak_lore2: §r - 击中身体可增加1.5秒隐身时间
fire_bomb_lore2: §r - 投掷一枚持续5秒的火焰炸弹
immunity_lore2: §r - 5秒内你和附近的队友免疫火焰伤害
turn_up_lore2: §r - 着火时移动速度提高1.4倍
plasma_spreader_lore: 近距离时拥有高DPS的武器
poison_jab_lore2: §r - 发射一枚有毒的投射物
slow_field_lore2: §r - 大幅减慢附近敌人的速度
weak_glow_lore1: 寻找受损敌人的小型跟踪粒子
weak_glow_lore2: §r - 低血量敌人在墙壁后也会发光
shock_hopper_lore: 发射能量手雷,为队友提供能量和治疗
energy_sap_lore1: 从敌人到盟友的无线能量转移
energy_dispersion_lore1: 从自己到盟友的无线能量转移
energy_dispersion_lore2: §r - 当你满能量时给附近盟友能量
piercing_dart_lore2: §r - 射出一枚高伤害的单发飞镖
resist_lore1: 增强装甲耐久,但不会持续太久

options.snooper.title: 给我们数据!
options.snooper.desc: 我们一直在努力改进Minecraft,为了帮助我们做到这一点,我们想收集一些信息。这可以让我们知道需要支持哪些硬件,以及哪里存在主要问题。它还让我们了解活跃玩家群体的规模,以便我们知道是否在做得好。您可以查看我们收集的所有信息。如果您想退出,只需将其关闭即可!

archives.function.anne_schmidt.line0.7: Anne Schmidt was born on the desert planet Sahara.  The planet is known for it's very hot days, and lack of water.  Anne worked as a water farmer with her parents.  The IGSR needed a new person to test a flame suit, but it required high resistance to heat.  They picked up Anne, thinking she would have a higher resistance to heat than most people.  While many soldiers thought they could use this set, only Anne really could.
Antonio was trained as a member of the RLU from early childhood.  He became rather experienced with close quarters combat.  Later, he realized the intentions of the RLU, and decided that he was going to side with the IGSR.
Barge grew up pumping iron, he was obsessed with muscles and competition.  An olympic event is hosted every 3 years between the planets Vesna and Sheridan.  Barge was chosen for the arena event.  While being dropped off by a S-Viper III he ripped the wing cannon off the ship.  His opponent, Reginald copied Barge for a fair game.  The crowds went ecstatic.  They dodged each other’s shots until finally Reginald landed a hit, leaving Barge to the paramedics.  Upset about his loss, he still thought he could beat his opponent.  He joined the Space Pirates, just so he could fight his old opponent, Reginald, and regain his victory.
archives.function.brim_rock.line0.2: Brim Rock was born on the planet Meltdown.  Most people from this planet have poor tempers, due to it being considered normal for a couple hundred years.  Brim is no exception to this rule.  The RLU was working near this planet and decided to pick up a few soldiers for a later mission.  Brim was chosen, and the RLU equipped him with a heated weapon.
archives.function.cain_rogers.line0.2: Cain Rogers, grew up in a humble farmstead with his two parents and older brother Chip.  Cain rarely fought with his brother, and the two generally stayed out of trouble.  Once Chip left home to join the IGSR, however, Cain lost some respect for his brother.  Cain was left to take care of the brothers’ parents and homestead.  He was forced to slowly watch them grow old and die.  Once Cain was alone, he decided to sell the farmland and search for his brother.  He ended up with the wrong people and joined the Raiders League United.  There, he become one of the most feared among the group.  Still, somewhere inside of him, he longs for his brother.
archives.function.chatter_barnes.line0.1: Brad Barnes was previously a high school teacher for a RLU occupied planet.  He commonly used the phrase ''Cut the Chatter,'' to quiet down his class.  One day the IGSR came into contact with him and paid him favorably to spy on the RLU.  He is now retired from teaching, going full into the spy force for the IGSR.
archives.function.chip_rogers.line0.1: Chip Rogers grew up in a humble farmstead with his two parents and younger brother, Cain.  Chip was always fascinated with the idea of making the world a better place, so he naturally wanted to enlist in the IGSR.  He left his family soon after.  He has been launched into battle many times, and is still faithful to the IGSR today, despite family problems.
archives.function.db_nebula.line0.3: D. B. Nebula grew up in a volatile household.  D. B. Lived near a scrapyard where he built many explosives with leftover fireworks.  As a teenager, he helped clear out a path for the IGSR.  They realized how useful his knowledge of explosives could be, so they enlisted him in the IGSR, and he's been around ever since.
archives.function.gunn_frobe.line0.3: Gunther Frobe grew up in a large, poverty-stricken family.  Gunther was the youngest of seven children.  He eventually learned to outpace his stronger, older siblings.  This is how he became known as Gunn, the name of a comet.  His father always had a distrust to the IGSR, likely causing Gunn's illegal path.
archives.function.halley_wales.line0.3: Halley grew up in a heavily protected household.  During her childhood, she won many footraces where her passion for speed sprouted.  She joined the Intergalactic Space Rangers when she was only 19, with encouragement from her older brother.  With the IGSR, Halley has been launched on many various missions.  Some say she still takes a morning jog around the HQ.
archives.function.howard_barton.line0.2: Howard Barton was born on the wealthy planet of New Finland.  New Finland heavily emphasized learning, and everyone is forced to go to school from ages 3-20.  The IGSR sometimes comes by to hire the most intelligent, the top of the class, and the most studious students.  Howard Barton was hired when he was 11.  Ever since, he has proved to be a very useful asset in many areas of research.
archives.function.jafan_kesysk.line0.1: Jafan spent the first twenty years of his life on the planet Sheridan never going anywhere and never doing anything.  He had a dead-end job at a local instant food chain.  That is where he realized that he couldn't do much on Sheridan, and decided to get off the planet as soon as possible.  He decided to join the first crew leaving the planet, which happened to be a RLU pirate ship.  He still hasn't regretted his choice.
archives.function.jasper_smith.line0.1: Jasper Smith was hired along side Howard Barton.  However Jasper was 19 and Howard was only 11.  Howard and Jasper worked on special chemicals that could be formed from thin air.  However, Howard received all the credit.  Jasper decided to join the RLU where he would be more appreciated.
archives.function.jenn_spurs.line0.3: Jenn wore eyeglasses for a large quantity of her life; she was legally blind.  However, Howard Barton, a scientist from the IGSR, created a special treatment for her condition.  It worked very well, so well her eyesight actually is superior to that of a normal person.  Sadly, the treatment had a major side affect; she forgot many major memories in her life.  Howard classified it as Large Memory Loss (LML).  Jenn eventually ran away.  Members of the Space Pirates agreed to help her recover memories if she joined them.  The RLU never finished the deal and Jenn forgot completely everything about it.  Her supervision made her naturally inclined to use a sniper rifle of some sort.
Johnny Sprocket was a very intelligent young student of physical mechanics and circuiting.  He eventually received government funding for his studies.  Unfortunately, Lkanst is a very militaristic planet, sending Johnny to the IGSR to aid in creating new weapons.
archives.function.komang_zlatan.line0.2: Komang Zlatan, born as a prince of the planet Dhanee, lived a very rich life.  Being so rich, he naturally was careless with everything he owned.  His father told him that he couldn't be king the way he acted.  Komang didn't let up, however, and he was put into a boarding school.  He eventually dropped out and went off on his own with nothing.  He could never get used to being poor, so he quickly joined the RLU, who promised him of getting rich quick.
archives.function.liz_ericson.line0.3: Liz always enjoyed helping people, and wanted to do even more.  She gladly cared for her grandma, until her tragic death in 3117.  Her parents noticed how unhappy she was and decided to take her to a local nurse presentation by the IGSR.  Liz grew a deep interest in the medical field, and decided to take a course as a field paramedic.  She highly enjoyed the course, and that’s what she’s been doing so ever since.
archives.function.maria_mercendesz.line0: Maria Mercédesz was raised in a rough third-world section of the planet Zaav.  Her family was so poor that they had no choice but to sell her when she was just nine years old.  She didn't like her owner, so she ran away, looking for a new life.  She found out about the IGSR and decided to join.
archives.function.moose_sayjack.line0.3: Moose was beat up a lot when he was little.  He eventually took steriods to help him defend himself;  He went from bullied to bully.  He was so mean the Space Pirates wanted him on their side.
archives.function.race_lago.line0.1: Race, a very iconic figure, was rumored to have been born on a space fighter in combat.  He was a renowned space merchant, known all over the universe for his highly protected space vessels.  Once the RLU started to increase rapidly, however, Race decided that he could not afford to have them around for very long.  He joined the IGSR more as a publicity stunt at first to increase his profits, but after being part of it a while, he made the force a full time job.
Reginald Shultz is naturally strong.  An olympic event is hosted every 3 years between the planets Vesna and Sheridan.  Reginald was chosen for the arena event.  While being droped off by a S-Viper III, his opponent, Barge Hernandez, ripped the wing cannon off the ship.  Reginald copied Barge for a fair game.  The crowds went ecstatic.  They dodged each other’s shots until finally Reginald landed a hit, leaving Barge to the paramedics.  Rumors flew about the event and later the IGSR, interested in hiring new members, talked to Reginald.
archives.function.sarah_salis.line0.1: Sarah Salis is a newly founded member of the RLU, and very little is known about her.
archives.function.sky_florence.line0.2: Sky Florence, grew up in a rich household.  He was raised loyal to the IGSR, coming from a long line of IGSR veterans.  Trained as a mobile trooper, Sky has much experience with a grappling hook.  He has likely proven his bloodline.
archives.function.spike_wong.line0.3: After the New China New Japan War, Spike was deported to the junking planet, Jahmen, where he lived in squalor with his family.  He wanted to help them, but realized his only choice was to join the local government.  This government was eventually taken over by the RLU, because they saw the value of the scrap.  Spike was eventually incorporated in the RLU.
archives.function.spud_stark.line0.2: Spud had a slingshot when he was very little.  At just the age of 5, he became a crackshot with it.  He later got a minirifle which he mastered almost immediately.  Noticing his skill, his father decided to send him off to the IGSR.  At the HQ, Spud became a Sharp-Shooter and eventually started the Sharp-Shooting League.  The SSL has become a very widely used sniping unit.
archives.function.star_workman.line0.3: Star and her parents were at the Grand Nightfall Station when a Space Pirate attack occured.  Her parents fled, leaving her to the Pirates.  They raised her and taught her to bandage the soldiers after battles.  When she was 17, they begain taking her along on major battles.  She was a very valuable resource.  She still works for them today.
archives.function.steve_manning.line0.3: Steve was part of a muscle multiplication project by the IGSR.  He was scrawny before the experiment, but very large afterwards.  He chose a close-range weapon to give his enemies ''a chance to change their pants after they saw him.''  It's a good thing he has a sense of humor.
archives.function.twitchy_mcghee.line0.1: Little is known about Twitchy McGhee, not even his real name.  However, it is widely known that he likes explosives.  It is even rumored he is so destructive the RLU removed him from capture missions, due to nothing being left to capture.
archives.function.viz_barclay.line0.3: Viz listened to stories of travelers and merchants passing by.  One traveler introduced the idea of entropy to Viz.  This idea influenced his thinking so much, he dedicated his life to it.  He wanted to raise awareness of this idea, but it was slowly turning him insane.  He is now working for the RLU, who promised to fund his studies at the cost of the creation of weapons.
Whitney Eclipse, possibly born on the planet Icelance, is a very dangerous spy for the RLU.  Her tactics usually involve seducing young IGSR members into giving information.  She is very dangerous and must be stopped.
